Detailed Description

Class used to define the location configuration for an xArray.

◆ ComputeWindowSeconds

ushort Impinj.OctaneSdk.LocationConfig.ComputeWindowSeconds
getset

Contains the the smoothing window for averaging the location estimates. Default is 10 seconds.

◆ DiagnosticReportEnabled

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.LocationConfig.DiagnosticReportEnabled

Enables or disables the diagnostic report.

List<ushort> Impinj.OctaneSdk.LocationConfig.DisabledAntennaList

Antennas can be disabled when configuring location. Set the list of currently disabled antennas.

◆ ExitReportEnabled

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.LocationConfig.ExitReportEnabled
getset

Enables or disables the location exit report.

◆ LocationAlgorithmControl

List<uint> Impinj.OctaneSdk.LocationConfig.LocationAlgorithmControl
getset

Custom location algorithm control parameters can be set when configuring location. Sets the list of key-value pairs to pass on to the location algorithm.

◆ MaxTxPower

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.LocationConfig.MaxTxPower
getset

If true, the reader will make antennas use their maximum transmit power. If false, the TxPowerInDbm value will be used as the antenna transmit power.

◆ TagAgeIntervalSeconds

ushort Impinj.OctaneSdk.LocationConfig.TagAgeIntervalSeconds
getset

Specifies how long a tag needs to go unseen before its removed from the location tracking. Default is 20 seconds.

◆ TxPowerInDbm

double Impinj.OctaneSdk.LocationConfig.TxPowerInDbm
getset

Sets the antenna transmit power in dbm

◆ UpdateIntervalSeconds

ushort Impinj.OctaneSdk.LocationConfig.UpdateIntervalSeconds
getset

Specifies how often to send out a location report. Default is 5 seconds.

◆ UpdateReportEnabled

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.LocationConfig.UpdateReportEnabled
getset

Enables or disables the location update report.
